translation.presentation: HELLO, I'M FULL STACK DEVELOPER REACT/JAVA SPRING BOOT AND MY NAME IS
translation.text-about: My name is Lucas, I'm 22 years old, and I'm a Full Stack developer with a focus on front end development. I am capable of creating complete web applications, from user interface design to business logic and database management. My goal is to develop solutions that not only meet but also exceed expectations. I am always seeking new learning opportunities and eagerly anticipating my next professional challenges.
translation.text-projects-page1: Here are some of the projects I have worked on
translation.text-contact2: If you want to contact me send me an email
translation.interest: If you are interested after viewing my portfolio and want to get in touch, I'm extremely excited to know that my work piqued his interest.
